Pre-Game Insights: India has a significant 19-11 lead over Australia in their T20I rivalry
This match also presents an opportunity for the Men in Blue to avenge their heartbreak from the 2023 ODI World Cup final
The Aussies boast a winning mentality in ICC white-ball tournaments
Miscellaneous Highlights: What to look forward to: A classic AUSvIND battle, Jasprit Bumrah tormenting the Aussie top-order, Hitman making merry of the Australian bowlers, a sold-out Daren Sammy National Cricket Stadium and that much-needed W over Pat Cummins’ Aussie team
Others: The ultimate Super 8 clash is here. It’s Australia vs India. A T20 World Cup 2024 semi-final berth is up for grabs, and the winner takes it all in St Lucia on Monday (June 24)
The match will take place at Daren Sammy National Cricket Stadium, Gros Islet, St Lucia
India, with two impressive wins in two games, are high on momentum and confidence. They are determined to secure their place in the semi-finals by topping Group 1
The article provides the squads for both India and Australia for the match
